data.title: Orbital completes sale of Magellan to Thales, reduces company debt
data.meta_description: Orbital Sciences Corp. announced July 16 it has reduced its total debt by about $200 million since the beginning of 2001. The announcement follows the sale of its Magellan Corp. subsidiary, completed July 16, and 60 percent of its interest in Navigation Solutions LLC (NavSol) to the Thales Group for about $70 million in cash. The sales are part of the company's plans to refocus on its core space technology products.
